meanings.sent1: The balconied apartment offered a lovely view of the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: The balconied house had a charming outdoor space for relaxing.
meanings.sent3: The balconied building looked like it was waving to the neighboring houses.
meanings.sent4: The balconied hotel stood out among the plain buildings on the street.
meanings.sent5: The balconied room felt like a private oasis in the bustling city.

meanings.sent1: We stayed in a balconied hotel room during our vacation.
meanings.sent2: The balconied suite was perfect for enjoying the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The balconied restaurant made dining al fresco a delightful experience.
meanings.sent4: The balconied villa was the ideal setting for a romantic getaway.
meanings.sent5: The balconied balcony provided a peaceful spot for morning coffee.
